errors.error_description: The instructions incorrectly advise installing PlatformIO globally before creating and activating the virtual environment, defeating the purpose of using an isolated environment.
correction_candidates: The `pip install -U platformio` command should be run after creating and activating the virtual environment.
The `pip install -U platformio` command should be run inside the virtual environment directory.
Remove the global installation step entirely and only install in the virtual environment.
The virtual environment should be created before installing any packages.
errors.golden_answer: The `pip install -U platformio` command should be run after creating and activating the virtual environment.
